name: Resume Builder 4 File
summary: Learn about .RB4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: RB4 files are used to format professional information such as biographical data, professional objectives, education history, employment history, honors and awards, and contact information. Resume Builder includes several pre-defined templates to help users create professional-looking resumes.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
